room_title: Escape room "Servants of Sleight" by The Exit Games FL in Tampa
room_description:
You've worked your whole life for this. Years of endless practice, mentorships, and performances. You've perfected your illusions and sleight of hand.  

Gaining entry into The Servants of Sleight is quite possibly the hardest accomplishment any magician can make. Becoming a member would put you in the company of the greatest magicians that have ever lived.  

You've received a mysterious tip informing you that the Brotherhood will be hosting initiation for its new members tonight... but only for those worthy of the honor. 

You're ready. Now prove it to them.
